headlines.description: Napoli survived a second-half fightback from Brescia to move into fourth place in Serie A with a 2-1 home win on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Balotelli opens Brescia account in loss at Napoli

venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: Edin Dzeko's goal secured a 1-0 win for AS Roma away to Lecce on Sunday to send them fifth in Serie A.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dzeko strike sends Roma fifth in Serie A

venue.displayName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: AC Milan's nightmare start to the Serie A season continued on Sunday when they fell to a 3-1 defeat at home to Fiorentina and had a man sent off.
headlines.shortLinkText: AC Milan beaten again as Fiorentina stroll
